com.example.appraisal.backend.geolocation

Class PermissionUtils

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.example.appraisal.backend.geolocation.PermissionUtils

  • public abstract class PermissionUtils
extends java.lang.Object
    Utility class for access to runtime permissions.

      static class  PermissionUtils.PermissionDeniedDialog
      A dialog that displays a permission denied message.

      A dialog that explains the use of the location permission and requests the necessary permission.

      • requestPermission

        public static void requestPermission(androidx.appcompat.app.AppCompatActivity activity,
                                     int requestId,
                                     java.lang.String permission,
                                     boolean finishActivity)
        Requests the fine location permission. If a rationale with an additional explanation should be shown to the user, displays a dialog that triggers the request.

      • isPermissionGranted

        public static boolean isPermissionGranted(@NonNull
                                          java.lang.String[] grantPermissions,
                                          int[] grantResults,
                                          java.lang.String permission)
        Checks if the result contains a PackageManager.PERMISSION_GRANTED result for a permission from a runtime permissions request.
        See Also:
        ActivityCompat.OnRequestPermissionsResultCallback
